scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Blogs_BlogLinks_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set($links = $core_v2_page.ParseQueryString($core_v2_widget.GetCustomValue('links','Link=weblogCreate&Link=weblogEdit&Link=weblogEditPost&Link=feature&Link=weblogDeletePost&Link=weblogSubscribe&Link=weblogFavorite&Link=weblogRss&Link=weblogManageCustomPages&Link=weblogEditTheme'))) #set($hasLinks = false) #set($currentGroup = $core_v2_group.Current) #set($currentBlog = $core_v2_blog.Current) #set($currentBlogPost = $core_v2_blogPost.Current) #set($currentBlogComment = $core_v2_blogComment.Current) #if($currentBlog) #set($canCreatePost = $core_v3_permission.CheckPermission($core_v2_blogPermissions.CreatePost, $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id, "%{ ApplicationId = $currentBlog.ApplicationId, ApplicationTypeId = $core_v2_blog.ApplicationTypeId }").IsAllowed) #end #set ($collapse = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('collapsed', false)) #set ($blogLinks = $links.Values('Link')) #set ($linksToShow = $blogLinks.Count * 2) #if ($collapse) #set ($linksToShow = 0) #end #foreach($link in $blogLinks) #beforeall

scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" labelResourceName="CF_Title" defaultValue="${resource:Blogs_BlogLinks_Title_Options}" dataType="String" template="core_v2_tokenizedString" /> <property id="collapsed" labelResourceName="collapsed" defaultValue="false" dataType="Bool" /> <property id="links" labelResourceName="Blogs_BlogLinks_Links" defaultValue="Link=weblogCreate&Link=weblogEdit&Link=weblogEditPost&Link=feature&Link=weblogDeletePost&Link=weblogSubscribe&Link=weblogFavorite&Link=weblogRss&Link=weblogManageCustomPages&Link=weblogEditTheme" dataType="Custom" template="core_v2_sortableList" height="300" key="Link"> <propertyValue value="weblogGroupBlogsRss" labelResourceName="Weblog_Link_GroupRss_Config" orderNumber="1000000" /> <propertyValue value="weblogAdministration" labelResourceName="Weblog_Link_BlogAdministration" orderNumber="1000001" /> <propertyValue value="weblogHome" labelResourceName="Home" orderNumber="1000002" /> <propertyValue value="weblogAbout" labelResourceName="Weblog_Link_AboutAuthor" orderNumber="1000003" /> <propertyValue value="weblogContact" labelResourceName="Weblog_Link_Contact" orderNumber="1000004" /> <propertyValue value="weblogFavorite" labelResourceName="Weblog_Link_Favorite" orderNumber="1000005" /> <propertyValue value="weblogPostFavorite" labelResourceName="Weblog_Link_FavoritePost" orderNumber="1000006" /> <propertyValue value="weblogPostShare" labelResourceName="Weblog_Link_PostShare" orderNumber="1000007" /> <propertyValue value="weblogEditPost" labelResourceName="Weblog_Link_EditPost" orderNumber="1000008" /> <propertyValue value="weblogAddPost" labelResourceName="Weblog_Quick_Post" orderNumber="1000009" /> <propertyValue value="weblogSendEmail" labelResourceName="Weblog_Link_PostByEmail" orderNumber="1000010" /> <propertyValue value="weblogRss" labelResourceName="Weblog_Link_Rss" orderNumber="1000011" /> <propertyValue value="weblogAtom" labelResourceName="Weblog_Link_Atom" orderNumber="1000012" /> <propertyValue value="weblogRssComments" labelResourceName="Weblog_Link_Rss_AllComments" orderNumber="1000013" /> <propertyValue value="weblogPostRssComments" labelResourceName="Weblog_Link_Rss_Comments" orderNumber="1000014" /> <propertyValue value="weblogSubscribe" labelResourceName="Weblog_Link_EmailSubscriptions" orderNumber="1000015" /> <propertyValue value="weblogPostSubscribe" labelResourceName="Weblog_Link_EmailPostSubscriptions" orderNumber="1000016" /> <propertyValue value="weblogQuickEdit" labelResourceName="Weblog_Quick_Manage" orderNumber="1000017" /> <propertyValue value="weblogManageCustomPages" labelResourceName="Weblog_Link_ManageCustomPages" orderNumber="1000018" /> <propertyValue value="weblogEditTheme" labelResourceName="Blogs_BlogLinks_EditTheme" orderNumber="1000019" /> <propertyValue value="weblogEdit" labelResourceName="Weblog_Link_ControlPanel" orderNumber="1000020" /> <propertyValue value="weblogCreate" labelResourceName="CF_CreateBlog" orderNumber="1000021" /> <propertyValue value="weblogPostAbuse" labelResourceName="Weblog_Post_Abuse" orderNumber="1000022" /> <propertyValue value="feature" labelResourceName="CF_feature" orderNumber="1000023" /> <propertyValue value="convert" labelResourceName="Convert" orderNumber="1000024" /> <propertyValue value="weblogDeletePost" labelResourceName="Weblog_Link_DeletePost" orderNumber="1000025" /> </property> </propertyGroup>
